subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: A team bus that got stuck at the finish line of the Tour de France’s first stage threatened the conclusion of the race.  Some riders, including Alberto Contador, crashed amid nervous confusion.
snippet: A team bus that got stuck at the finish line of the Tour de France’s first stage threatened the conclusion of the race.  Some riders, including Alberto Contador, crashed amid nervous confusion.
